question.text: How would you react to drivers who appear to be inexperienced?

explanation.text: Learners might not have confidence when they first start to drive. Allow them plenty of room and don’t react adversely to their hesitation. We all learn from experience, but new drivers will have had less practice in dealing with all the situations that might occur.

answer.text: Sound your horn to warn them of your presence
Be patient and prepare for them to react more slowly
Flash your headlights to indicate that it is safe for them to proceed
Overtake them as soon as possible
